event_name: Industrial Visit to Hinduja National Power Corporation Limited
department: Department of Electrical and Electronics Engineering
venue: Hinduja National Power Corporation Limited, Palavalasa Village, Padagantayada Mandal, Visakhapatnam - 530031. (2 x 520 MW Vizag Thermal Power Station)
description: An industrial visit organized by the Department of Electrical and Electronics Engineering to the Hinduja National Power Corporation Limited's 2 x 520 MW Vizag Thermal Power Station. The visit aims to provide students with practical exposure to thermal power generation and industrial operations.
target_audience: Students of Electrical and Electronics Engineering
additional_info: Organized by Nadimpalli Satyanarayana Raju Institute of Technology (NSRIT Autonomous) and IEEE Student Branch NSRIT (STB16441). NSRIT was established in 2008.
raw_text: Estd. 2008 NSRIT AUTONOMOUS IEEE STB16441 STUDENT BRANCH NSRIT INDUSTRIAL VIST TO HINDUJA NATIONAL POWER CORPORATION LIMITED Palavalasa Village, Padagantayada Mandal, Visakhapatnam - 530031. 2 x 520 MW Vizag Thermal Power Station Organized by Department of Electrical and Electronics Engineering 29TH January 2026 Nadimpalli Satyanarayana Raju Institute of Technology, Visakhapatnam Scanned with OKEN Scanner
